webEncoder

Class CompleteStoryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • webEncoder.CompleteStoryLoader

  • public class CompleteStoryLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This loads the stories from the server to be returned to the browser The AJAXscripts must be loaded from the html file for full functionality
    Author:
    nickleus`

      • PreviewLikedStoriesJson

        public java.lang.String PreviewLikedStoriesJson(User myUser)
        Returns a JSON syntax to be parsed. The syntax returned represents The values of the stories that a user likes. The values are to be placed in a table to show the stories the user likes Having it in JSON allows manipulation on the browser/clinet side
